title: Available for Trade Huggins, Sovereign 460 Gandil, King S/L
author: slipk1068

posts.post_title: Available for Trade Huggins, Sovereign 460 Gandil, King S/L
posts.post_content:
I would like to trade these doubles for cards I need. I collect graded 3,4,and 5, or the raw equivalent. I am a little fussy about what I like/don't like so please don't be offended if I reject your offer.

Huggins: Couple of creases near/in his face, some ghost image can be seen in scan above "SWEET"  and below "SUBJECTS."

Gandil: Horizontal crease running through his cap border to border, very nice clean Sovereign 460 back

King: Light corner crease bottom left, Southern Leaguer
